title: go/ssa: crash during SSA construction
body:
package main

type I interface {
	f() chan int
}

func f(i I) {
	select {
	case <-chan int(nil):
		var i I
	case <-i.f():
	}
}
% ssadump -build=F a.go
panic: no Value for type.Object i

goroutine 17 [running]:
